# phosphorR

[![Lifecycle Experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)

## Overview

HTMLWidget implementation of [PhosphorJS](http://phosphorjs.github.io/).

Uses PhosphorJS library created from [this fork](https://github.com/serenity-r/phosphor).

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Install the development version from GitHub:
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("serenity-r/phosphorr")
```

Please note that the 'phosphorR' project is released with a [Contributor Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
